text: John G Rowan (16 August 1890 – 4 December 1963) was a Scottish footballer who played for Dumbarton, Hamilton Academical, and Dunfermline Athletic. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Hamilton Academical F.C. players Category:Dunfermline Athletic F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:1963 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Fife Category:Association football forwards
title: John Rowan (footballer)
